aiSandbox.title: AI Research
aiSandbox.author: Dr. Sundaram Ramakrishnan
aiSandbox.description: Roberto A. Mossi Milla is one of the most outstanding undergraduate students in the Computer and Information Science (CIS) program at Gannon University. Roberto is a diligent and conscientious worker who, in addition to excellence in course work, has been actively and proactively engaged in project activities which significantly benefit faculty-led research projects. I strongly recommend him to the internship and technical positions based on the following attributes.

aiSandbox.title: AI研究
aiSandbox.author: ラマクリシュナん・スンダラム教授
